title: REFRESH: Responsible and Efficient Feature Reselection Guided by SHAP Values
abstract: arXiv:2403.08880v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Feature selection is a crucial step in building machine learning models. This process is often achieved with accuracy as an objective, and can be cumbersome and computationally expensive for large-scale datasets. Several additional model performance characteristics such as fairness and robustness are of importance for model development. As regulations are driving the need for more trustworthy models, deployed models need to be corrected for model characteristics associated with responsible artificial intelligence. tldr: 本文介绍了特征重选择的问题，使得特征可以根据次要模型性能特征进行选择，从而纠正与负责任人工智能相关的模型特征。
